#summary First steps

= Introduction =

This page will give you, step by step, the information needed to start with our API


= Details =
 # To access our API, you need an API key. So, the first thing you should do is contact our customer service.
 # Using our documentation and examples, you should try to call a basic API function : [getServerTime](). Doing so, you'll be able to check if everything is ok on your side.
 # Once you have your API key, you can begin to call our API functions to insert items on the website.
